item.title: Version 1.0.9+10
item.description:
Release Notes - 1.0.9+10

WARNING: If you are a Windows user, you will need to reinstall the application completely due to changes in the installer. Access wiki for further instructions.

Features:

  • Added statistics screen to view, analyse and compare productivity for different users. Accessible by managers and admins. Supports sorting, filtering and time ranges selection.
  • Added «Go To Today» button to quickly return to today.
  • Added view controls for screenshots playback and improved overall visuals.
  • Improved Windows installer to no longer require admin rights
  • Added manual update check into settings.
  • Support for offline mode in case of poor connection.

Fixes:

  • Fixed the issue with freezing mouse and keyboard during screenshot capture.
  • Fixed application dropping to sign-in page during system start.
  • Fixed application not opening from dock on MacOS.
  • Fixed visual issues related to date ranges.
